name: Azudhrad
description:
The world is dyeing, nature has lost it's beauty. and only you and your faerie familiar can change that. Adventure in the depths of Azudhrad's lair, facing various enemies, in a quest to restore the balance that was lost. In this quick little game, you can use of jumps and a selection of different weapons (hidden around in secret chests) while collecting the crystals needed to heal back the world.


This game was made in 7 days, for the VimJam "There and Back" Game Jam.
